channel.title: system-design on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in system-design on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Building a Data-Driven Project Reporting System: A Lens into Modern Data Engineering
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Picture yourself as a skilled carpenter who’s mastered building beautiful furniture, only to be asked to construct an entire house.

item.title: Designing a model with dynamic properties
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When we started working on this project aimed at the creative community, we faced an interesting challenge. We needed to build a model that was similar to a task but with a key difference: it had to support custom, dynamic, and extensible properties.

item.title: Low-fidelity prototype: UI Design
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Research 1. Understand prospect Understanding stakeholder, company, business model, goals and challenges of the product in order to set mindset, define style, color palette, and typography, iconography, illustration, and photography.
